text: After this there was a Jewish feast, and Jesus went up to Jerusalem.
Now there is in Jerusalem by the Sheep Gate a pool called Bethzatha in Aramaic, which has five covered walkways.

A <st data-num="4128">great number</st> of <st data-num="770" class="">sick</st>, <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>, <st data-num="5560" class="">lame</st>, and <st data-num="3584" class="">paralyzed</st> people were <st data-num="2621" class="">lying</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778">these</st> walkways.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> who had been <st data-num="769">disabled</st> for <st data-num="5144 3638">38</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st>.<n id="1" />

When <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3778">him</st> <st data-num="2621" class="">lying</st> there <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> when he <st data-num="1097" class="">realized</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the man<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2192">had</st> been disabled a <st data-num="4183" class="">long</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st> <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st>, he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “Do you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="5199" class="">well</st>?”

The <st data-num="770" class="">sick man</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2962" class="">Sir</st>,<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="444" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="906" class="">put</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> into the <st data-num="2861" class="">pool</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> is <st data-num="5015" class="">stirred up</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">While</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am trying to <st data-num="2064" class="">get</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">into</st> the water,<n id="2" /> someone <st data-num="243" class="">else</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2597" class="">goes down</st> there<n id="4" /> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1453">Stand up</st>! <st data-num="142">Pick up</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2895" class="">mat</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walk</st>.”
Immediately the man was healed, and he picked up his mat and started walking. (Now that day was a Sabbath.)
So the Jewish leaders said to the man who had been healed, “It is the Sabbath, and you are not permitted to carry your mat.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “The man who <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="5199" class="">well</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, ‘<st data-num="142">Pick up</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2895" class="">mat</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4043">walk</st>.’”

They <st data-num="2065" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846">him</st>, “Who <st data-num="1510">is</st> the <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> who <st data-num="2036">said</st> to <st data-num="4771">you</st>, ‘<st data-num="142">Pick up</st> your mat<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4043">walk</st>’?”<n id="2" />
But the man who had been healed did not know who it was, for Jesus had slipped out, since there was a crowd in that place.
After this Jesus found him at the temple and said to him, “Look, you have become well. Don’t sin any more, lest anything worse happen to you.”
The man went away and informed the Jewish leaders that Jesus was the one who had made him well.
Now because Jesus was doing these things on the Sabbath, the Jewish leaders began persecuting him.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> he<n id="1" /> <st data-num="611" class="">told</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1473">My</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> is <st data-num="2038" class="">working</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> <st data-num="737" class="">now</st>, <st data-num="2504">and I</st> too am <st data-num="2038" class="">working</st>.”<n id="3" />
For this reason the Jewish leaders were trying even harder to kill him because not only was he breaking the Sabbath, but he was also calling God his own Father, thus making himself equal with God.
So Jesus answered them, “I tell you the solemn truth, the Son can do nothing on his own initiative, but only what he sees the Father doing. For whatever the Father does, the Son does likewise.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="5368" class="">loves</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1166" class="">shows</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> he <st data-num="4160" class="">does</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="1166" class="">show</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">greater</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> than <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will be <st data-num="2296" class="">amazed</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5618">just as</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">raises</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2227" class="">gives</st> them <st data-num="2227" class="">life</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> <st data-num="2227">gives life</st> to <st data-num="3739" class="">whomever</st> he <st data-num="2309" class="">wishes</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">Furthermore</st>, the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> does <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3762" class="">anyone</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> has <st data-num="1325" class="">assigned</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2920" class="">judgment</st> to the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>,
so that all people will honor the Son just as they honor the Father. The one who does not honor the Son does not honor the Father who sent him.
“I tell you the solemn truth, the one who hears my message and believes the one who sent me has eternal life and will not be condemned, but has crossed over from death to life.

I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281">solemn</st> <st data-num="281">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="5610" class="">time</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st>—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> here—<st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> will <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> the <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> of the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those who <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> will <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5618">just as</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">thus</st> he has <st data-num="1325" class="">granted</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> to <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>,
and he has granted the Son authority to execute judgment because he is the Son of Man.
“Do not be amazed at this, because a time is coming when all who are in the tombs will hear his voice

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="1607">come out</st>—the ones who have <st data-num="4160">done</st> what is <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> resulting in <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>, <st data-num="1161">and</st> the ones who have <st data-num="4238" class="">done</st> what is <st data-num="5337" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> resulting in <st data-num="2920" class="">condemnation</st>.<n id="1" />
I can do nothing on my own initiative. Just as I hear, I judge, and my judgment is just because I do not seek my own will, but the will of the one who sent me.
“If I testify about myself, my testimony is not true.

There <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st><n id="1" /> who <st data-num="3140" class="">testifies</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> the <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st> he <st data-num="3140" class="">testifies</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="227" class="">true</st>.

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> have <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he has <st data-num="3140" class="">testified</st> to the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.

(<st data-num="1473">I</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">accept</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="444" class="">human</st> <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> may be <st data-num="4982">saved</st>.)
He was a lamp that was burning and shining, and you wanted to rejoice greatly for a short time in his light.
“But I have a testimony greater than that from John. For the deeds that the Father has assigned me to complete—the deeds I am now doing—testify about me that the Father has sent me.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> has <st data-num="1565" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="3140" class="">testified</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. You people<n id="1" /> have <st data-num="3777" class="">never</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="3708" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1491" class="">form</st> <st data-num="4455">at any time</st>,<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3756" class="">nor</st> do you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">residing</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> the one <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> he <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st>.

You <st data-num="2045" class="">study</st> the <st data-num="1124" class="">scriptures</st> <st data-num="2045">thoroughly</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1380" class="">think</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> you <st data-num="2192" class="">possess</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">these</st> same scriptures<n id="3" /> that <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>,
but you are not willing to come to me so that you may have life.
“I do not accept praise from people,

<st data-num="235" class="">but</st> I <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">within</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962">Father’s</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">accept</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. <st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> <st data-num="243">someone else</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>, you will <st data-num="2983" class="">accept</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1565" class="">him</st>.
How can you believe, if you accept praise from one another and don’t seek the praise that comes from the only God?
“Do not suppose that I will accuse you before the Father. The one who accuses you is Moses, in whom you have placed your hope.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st><n id="1" /> you <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st>, you would <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1125" class="">wrote</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
But if you do not believe what Moses wrote, how will you believe my words?”
